text: - [Narrator] Finding software

that meets your business'
security and compliance needs

can be complex and cause delays
of up to eight to 10 weeks.

Buyers would once send dense,
customized questionnaires
to the vendor of each software,

and vendors would have to
dedicate time and resources
to fielding each individual questionnaire.
Getting a response could take weeks
and would still need to be validated.

Introducing AWS Marketplace
Vendor Insights,
an AWS Marketplace solution

that streamlines the
risk assessment process
by making the up-to-date

and evidence-backed security
and compliance information
available on demand.
With Vendor Insights,

buyers can download and review
current standardized data
and evidence about each software instantly
on AWS Marketplace.

Vendor Insights has
standardized the process
with over 100 security controls,

each backed by evidence
from three sources.

Automated evidence that's
continuously monitored

and verified using AWS Config
and Audit Manager assessments;

external audit reports,
such as an ISO report;
and the software vendor's self-assessment.
With Vendor Insights,
buyers can sign up to be notified

if the software's
security posture changes.

That means if a software's
compliance certification expires
or if the data is no longer encrypted,
you'll know right away.
Vendor Insights also brings automation
to how vendors can gather

and share their security
and compliance information.
Now, they can share their profile
instead of filling out a questionnaire.

That information is clearly
displayed on AWS Marketplace,
so buyers can evaluate, procure,

and use their software
in hours, not months.
AWS Marketplace Vendor Insights,
streamlining the search for software

to help you move forward
with speed and confidence.
(upbeat music)
